entry.title: 3M M-6050-EBY-3X82 - 3M Nomad Medium Traffic Backed Scraper Matting, 6050, black, 3 ft x 82 ft (0.9 m x 25 m) M-6050-EBY-3X82 7000126498
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 2913.67

[shortdesc]

3M Nomad Medium Traffic Backed Scraper Matting, 6050, black, 3 ft x 82 ft (0.9 m x 25 m)

  • 3M™ Nomad™ Medium Traffic Backed Scraper Matting 6050 is a carpet-like floor matting that traps dirt and water, keeping both off floors
  • It is stain and crush-resistant, with a dual-fiber construction.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Continually provides a cleaner floor at the entrance and throughout the facility
  • Helps protect the floor from damage due to tracked-in soil and other debris
  • Helps to reduce the time and effort needed to clean and maintain floors
  • Reduces dirt and water on hard floors, which can help reduce slips and falls
  • Random pattern design that provides attractive functionality
  • Low profile allows foot, cart and wheelchair traffic to move easily over the mat
    		•

entry.title: 3M CT8NT50-C - 3M Miniature Cable Tie, CT8NT50-C, natural, 8 in (19.3 cm) CT8NT50-C 7000031855
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 8.14

[shortdesc]

3M Miniature Cable Tie, CT8NT50-C, natural, 8 in (19.3 cm)

  • 3M™ Cable Ties are made with high quality 6/6 nylon and designed to secure wire bundles and harness components quickly, without slipping
  • The ends of the cable ties possess curved tips that allow faster threading and installation
  • The flexible design allows the user to slip ties easily under and around cables and harnesses
  • These ties can be used with most standard tensioning/cut-off tools for fast production line fastening
  • The 3M™ Cable Tie CT8NT50-C is 8 inches (19.3 cm) in length, features a 50 pound tensile strength and is Plenum Rated.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Extra Product Information

  • The 3M™ Cable Tie CT8NT50-C has a self locking head and a curved tip that allows for faster threading and installation

entry.title: JET JAFM-500 - Small Anti-Fatigue Mat 355191
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Mats
Price: 43.43

[shortdesc]

Small Anti-Fatigue Mat

  • Thick closed cell EVA foam pads protect workers from hard, rough surfaces
  • Resists absorption of water, oil and many chemicals, is non-conductive and easy to clean
  • Ultra-light weight for portability, with convenient hand hole for easy carrying and storage
  • Can be used as an anti-fatigue mat, kneeling pad, under car mat, or anywhere a worker needs to be kept off the ground
  • Ideal for service vehicles, roofers, installers, mechanics, shippers, production line workers, store clerks etc.
  • Due to the nature of this product no warranty is offered
    • [/shortdesc]
